seo.title: UK newcomer coaching for international professionals | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching to decode UK workplace norms, communicate across cultures, and build support systems.

hero.title: Translate who you are into the UK workplace with confidence.
hero.subtitle: We unpack cultural codes, communication, and systems so you can land well without losing yourself.

who.title: Who this is for
items: You’re new to the UK job market and unsure how hiring really works.
You’ve recently moved and are balancing visas, housing, and a job search.
You’re taking on a UK-based role in a global company and want to adapt communication.
You need space to process bias or microaggressions while staying strategic.

what.title: What we work on
items: Decoding job descriptions, applications, and interviews for UK expectations.
Strengthening narratives that highlight international experience and cultural fluency.
Planning stakeholder conversations that respect cultural and legal boundaries.
Building networks and support without exhausting yourself.

how.title: How it works
how.description: Support tailored to help you integrate without over-assimilating.
items: Six 60-minute Zoom sessions across 12–16 weeks, timed with your settlement milestones.
Session focus is co-designed; we respond to live interviews, workplace challenges, and wellbeing needs.
Between-session check-ins via secure notes or Loom when urgent decisions appear.
We provide cultural insight and coaching—not legal, immigration, or promised hiring outcomes.

items.title: Landing the first UK role
items.description: We translated a Taiwanese marketer’s achievements for UK recruiters, rehearsed interviews, and planned networking that respected visa limits.

items.title: Negotiating sponsorship
items.description: A product manager prepared a confident case for Skilled Worker sponsorship, aligned expectations with HR, and set boundaries around timelines.

items.title: Finding voice in a hybrid team
items.description: We designed meeting scripts, feedback loops, and allies so an APAC lead could challenge bias in a London headquarters.

expect.title: What you can expect
items: Language that bridges cultures without erasing your story.
A clear integration or job-search plan with checkpoints you own.
Confidence addressing bias while keeping yourself safe.
A map of people, communities, and resources to sustain you.

ethics.title: Ethics & fit
items: Confidential, ICF-aligned coaching that respects immigration sensitivities.
We do not provide legal or immigration advice; we signpost trusted specialists.
Pace is co-designed to protect your wellbeing and cultural identity.
We stand with you against bias without pushing assimilation or toxic positivity.

cta.title: Need a grounded partner as you settle in the UK?
cta.body: Book a 20-minute chat so we can understand your context and decide the next step together.
